about.subtitle: Who I Am
about.title: About Me
about.text: Hey there, I'm Pascal! Write some information about yourself that is IT related. Why are you passionate about coding? What is your source of inspiration for improving your programming skills?
about.info1: Flexible in terms of working environments, I can work effectively both on-site and remotely.
about.info2: I am open-minded and always looking for personal challenges to constantly improve my knowledge and skills.
about.info3: In my profession, programming isn't just about writing code â€“ it's a creative form of problem-solving. I take pride in my ability to distill complex technical challenges into simple, user-friendly solutions. This way, I help you achieve your goals and bring your visions to life.

skills.subtitle: Technologies
skills.title: Skill Set
skills.text: An overview of the technologies I work with. I value clean code, modern frontend patterns, and continuous learning â€“ especially in a field that evolves so quickly.
skills.questionText: Just reach out â€” I learn quickly and enjoy diving into new technologies.
